features: 【GORGEOUS & UNIQUE DESIGN】-- The big solar outdoor lantern has a cute looking style with beautiful hollowed-out pattern, a modern and unique garden decor for you. At night, the gentle light with designed pattern adds the beauty to the garden.

【 MULTI FUNCTIONAL】--This garden solar lights can be used as tree lights, patio umbrella lights, front & back porch decor or place on a table. The warm light will cast a beautiful pattern on the wall or table top, decorate your patio a little different.

【ENERGY EFFICIENCY】-- These decorative patio outdoor lanterns are solar powered, which are convenient and saves your energy cost. Expose the solar panel to the direct sunlight and allow it to be fully charged during the day. The light will be auto turned on at night and working for up to 8 hours. (make sure you turn “ON” button before charging)
【WEATHER RESISTANT & DURABLE】-- IPX4 waterproof rating, corrosion resistant, suitable for any outdoor environments.

【100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE】-- We promise a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee and 365 Day Limited Product Warranty, order without worries. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions with your purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had a set of these for over a year and they are still shining bright. They were used for a wedding where they were incredible. I now have them on my patio and they still look great. Extremely happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These really are lovely. The pattern of light they cast on a table or other surface is beautiful. I’ve had three for a year and a half. I leave them out year round and they all still look and work perfectly. I haven’t even changed the batteries. They are lightweight and do tend to get blown over by the wind. But I solved that problem by filling them about 1/4 full of marbles to weigh them down, which doesn’t interfere with the operation and also looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These lanterns are gorgeous! I had purchased these for myself and when my aunt was visiting, she fell in love with them, so I ordered two more for her as a surprise. She loves them. They stay charged and add a beautiful ambience when sitting outside - not too bright but just enough light to enjoy! If you buy them you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks beautiful on my tables outside. Beautiful design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I just received this lantern this evening and so it’s working with whatever power was in the battery but it’s so beautiful. Very lightweight and easy to hang. Looks beautiful hanging or setting on a surface. I would have concern about it blowing over in a storm if not secured to something. I’ll add an update after I’ve had a chance to observe charging and length of time the light stays lit at night.Edit: three years later and up until last week this lantern has been hanging from my patio roof this whole time looking beautiful and lighting up nightly. Even on cloudy days it would stay lit long into the night. Unfortunately, last week I noticed it wasn’t lighting up anymore. I will be purchasing a replacement in hopes that I will get the same quality product. In my opinion three plus years is pretty good. Note: the spot it hangs in gets is the side of the house that get hit with direct sun in afternoon and evening as it’s on the corner and usually gets hit with wind and sideways rain during storms. It’s held up in some pretty extreme weather and was left out year round.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are stunning and the shadows that they cast on the ground are absolutely beautiful. The pictures in the advertisement just don’t do them justice. One thing to keep in mind is they are small, so look at the measurements product dimensions before ordering, but just because they are small don’t let that deter you from getting them. They are absolutely beautiful, they have a little hook to hang them from the shepherds hook to if you want to but I just have mine sitting on the ground and I also got the warranty for them for like six or seven dollars and they’ll be good for three years this says or they’ll replace them so totally worth the money. I absolutely love them. I love them so much I bought two more sets of them so I have six total.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just get two
reviews.reviewText: These are so cute that you'll end up buying a second anyway so you might as well get 2. Can't see these as being hangable unless you glue the tops on. They come off easily. But great around my apartment patio. I have 3, one on each wall of my patio. I put them on the top tiers of my planters. Looks great during the day and so nice at night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t last very long
reviews.reviewText: They set off a pretty light in my patio but they no longer work. They are in a sunny spot & I have wiped the solar panel off to get rid of any debris or dirt, but light faded to almost nothing.
Not as nice as other solar lanterns purchased. Cheap looking exterior.
Es muy linda la lámpara pero la luz es demasiado debil es casi imperceptible y pues sin esto de nada sirve el nombre de lámpara por que no da luz, triste
